Teacher Akinyi 
 Lawrence A. Konjuro 
 English 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 This is my teacher. 
 
 
 
 Her name is Teacher 
 
 Akinyi. 
 
 
 
 She loves us a lot. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Teacher Akinyi teaches us 
 
 the alphabet. 
 
 
 
 She teaches us the vowels. 
 
 
 
 I can say the leters a, e, i, 
 
 o, u. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 2  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Teacher Akinyi teaches us 
 
 colours. 
 
 
 
 I know red, blue, gren, 
 
 yelow, and black. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 3  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 During nap time, Teacher 
 
 Akinyi sings us to slep. 
 
 
 
 She sings a lulaby to us. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The lulaby goes like this: 
 
 
 
 Golden slumber give your eyes 
 
 Smiles await you when you rise 
 
 Slep prety darlings, do not cry 
 
 And Iâ€™l sing you a swet lulaby. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 5  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Teacher Akinyi knows many stories. 
 
 
 
 She tels us a diferent story each day of the wek. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 On Monday, she tels us 
 
 stories about great men. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 7  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 On Tuesday, she tels us 
 
 stories about great women. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 8  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 On Wednesday, she tels us 
 
 stories about means of 
 
 transport. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 9  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 On Thursday, she tels us 
 
 stories about farming. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 10  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 And on Friday, we tel our 
 
 own stories to the clas. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Our teacher is the best 
 
 teacher in the world! 
 
 
 
 When I grow up, I want to 
 
 be like Teacher Akinyi.
